data.title: Counting in Shadok
data.statement:
Because Shadoks can't remember more than 4 things at a time, they count in <<base 4>>.
They can only pronounce 4 syllables: <<GA>>, <<BU>>, <<ZO>> and <<MEU>>.
You have to translate [[N]] decimal integers [[X]]'s in shadok language.

testCases.title: Test 1
testCases.testOut:
GA
BU
ZO
MEU
BUGA
BUBU

testCases.title: Validator 1
testCases.testOut:

BUGA
MEU
ZO

GA

data.stubGenerator:
read N:int
loop N
read x:int
write answer
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> an integer [[N]] for the <<number of lines>>.
<<Next [[N]] lines:>> an <<integer>> [[X]] to translate.
data.outputDescription: <<[[N]] lines:>> the translation of [[X]] in Shadok.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Because Shadoks can't remember more than 4 things at a time, they count in base 4.
They can only pronounce 4 syllables: GA, BU, ZO and MEU.
You have to translate N decimal integers X's in shadok language.
Input
Line 1: an integer N for the number of lines.
Next N lines: an integer X to translate.
Output
N lines: the translation of X in Shadok.
Constraints
1<=N<=20
0<=X<=10000
Example
Input
6
0
1
2
3
4
5
Output
GA
BU
ZO
MEU
BUGA
BUBU
